attributes.description: Saved locations count metric showing total locations saved by users.

attributes.description: Locations saved per user showing distribution of location saves across users.

attributes.description: Locations saved over time showing temporal distribution of new location saves.
attributes.title: [ECCS] Locations Over Time

attributes.description: Interactive map showing saved locations with markers. Click on a marker to see location details including name and address.
attributes.layerListJSON: [{"id": "base-map", "label": "Road map", "minZoom": 0, "maxZoom": 24, "alpha": 1, "sourceDescriptor": {"type": "EMS_TMS", "isAutoSelect": true, "lightModeDefault": "road_map_desaturated"}, "visible": true, "style": {"type": "TILE"}, "type": "EMS_VECTOR_TILE"}, {"id": "locations-layer", "label": "Saved Locations", "minZoom": 0, "maxZoom": 24, "alpha": 0.75, "sourceDescriptor": {"type": "ES_SEARCH", "geoField": "location", "filterByMapBounds": true, "tooltipProperties": ["name", "address", "user_id", "created_at"], "sortField": "created_at", "sortOrder": "desc", "scalingType": "MVT", "indexPatternRefName": "layer_1_source_index_pattern"}, "visible": true, "style": {"type": "VECTOR", "properties": {"icon": {"type": "STATIC", "options": {"value": "marker"}}, "fillColor": {"type": "STATIC", "options": {"color": "#54B399"}}, "lineColor": {"type": "STATIC", "options": {"color": "#41937c"}}, "lineWidth": {"type": "STATIC", "options": {"size": 1}}, "iconSize": {"type": "STATIC", "options": {"size": 10}}, "iconOrientation": {"type": "STATIC", "options": {"orientation": 0}}, "labelText": {"type": "DYNAMIC", "options": {"field": {"name": "name", "origin": "source"}}}, "labelColor": {"type": "STATIC", "options": {"color": "#000000"}}, "labelSize": {"type": "STATIC", "options": {"size": 12}}, "labelBorderColor": {"type": "STATIC", "options": {"color": "#FFFFFF"}}, "labelBorderSize": {"options": {"size": "SMALL"}}, "symbolizeAs": {"options": {"value": "circle"}}}}, "type": "MVT_VECTOR"}]
attributes.mapStateJSON: {"zoom": 2, "center": {"lon": 0, "lat": 20}, "timeFilters": {"from": "now-30d", "to": "now"}, "refreshConfig": {"isPaused": false, "interval": 60000}, "query": {"query": "", "language": "kuery"}, "filters": [], "settings": {"autoFitToDataBounds": false, "backgroundColor": "#ffffff", "disableInteractive": false, "disableTooltipControl": false, "hideToolbarOverlay": false, "hideLayerControl": false, "hideViewControl": false, "initialLocation": "LAST_SAVED_LOCATION", "fixedLocation": {"lat": 20, "lon": 0, "zoom": 2}, "browserLocation": {"zoom": 10}, "keydownScrollZoom": false, "showScaleControl": false, "showSpatialFilters": true, "showTimesliderToggleButton": true, "spatialFiltersAlpa": 0.3, "spatialFiltersFillColor": "#DA8B45", "spatialFiltersLineColor": "#DA8B45"}}
attributes.title: [ECCS] Saved Locations Map
